name: Parsley Potatoes
recipeYield: 6 to 8 servings with pot au feu
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian, fall, parsley, potato, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 pounds medium-size new potatoes, peeled and quartered
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put potatoes in a saucepan, cover with cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook, uncovered, 15 to 20 minutes, until the potatoes are just tender when pierced with a knifepoint. Drain.

Return potatoes to the saucepan and add the remaining ingredients. Toss gently and, if necessary, warm over low heat or place in an oven-proof serving dish, cover with foil and keep warm in a 200-degree oven until ready to serve.
